lead_paragraph: The Rev. Georg Ratzinger said in an interview that he had no knowledge that boys in the internationally known choir he once directed had been sexually abused.

headline.print_headline: Benedict’s Brother Says He Was Unaware of Abuse
headline.main: Pope Benedict’s Brother Says He Was Unaware of Abuse

snippet: The Rev. Georg Ratzinger said in an interview that he had no knowledge that boys in the internationally known choir he once directed had been sexually abused.
abstract: Rev Georg Ratzinger, German Roman Catholic Church official and older brother of pope emeritus Benedict XVI, says he had no knowledge of alleged sexual abuse committed against young boys of Bavarian choir he directed for 30 years, the Regensburger Domspatzen..

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith
